name: Stoppage
description:
A nice space shoot 'em up game made for Mini Jam #112. In it you wage your score to get upgrades and try to get a better score, being able to stop time to escape tight spots. It respects both theme and limitation.

Theme: Chrono

Limitation: Only 3 Buttons

Controls:

The ship follows the mouse cursor

Left Mouse Button to Shoot

Right Mouse Button to Pause/Menu

SpaceKey to Stop Time
